description:
Pycharm (which is quite ressource hungry) may offer slightly more convenience (python doc, and own docstring as popup) but that may only seem so as I'm new to Spyder. 

+ Running it on Fedora34
+ Spyder is lightning fast
+ Lot's of posibilities to configure
+ Great helpful community
- Github integration is not as convenient as in Pycharm, but I shsall master  	also this setup .

Great Product - and I think I've only touched the surface of what it's capable of.
I don't want anything else.
Many thanks for your great and hard work.
I'm working with data science and Spyder is spectacular. I'm using on Fedora 34 and that is amazing, fast, clear and practical
can i use spyder whit js,css,html?
thanks every one , a genius developers
Die Anwendung SCHMECKT auf jeden Fall sehr KORREKT muss ich sagen. Sie hilft mir in meinem Arbeitsalltag und begleitet mich in meiner Freizeit ständig und das ohne großartiger Strapazen
Es una ide exelente para aprender a programar en python
Mejor instalarla desde la terminal para obtener la versión mas reciente, no recomiendo usar anaconda para esta aplicación, tuve varios problemas con el kernel
